Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.unisa.diem.ai.torcs.agent.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseDriver, DeadSimpleSoloController
public abstract class Controller extends Object
Abstract base class for implementing a TORCS car controller. Provides the structure for control logic and race management.

  • Method Details

    • initAngles

      public float[] initAngles()
      Initializes the range finder angles used for sensing the track.
      Returns:
      an array of 19 angles from -90 to +90 degrees in steps of 10

    • getStage

      public Controller.Stage getStage()
      Returns the current race stage.
      Returns:
      the current Stage

    • setStage

      public void setStage(Controller.Stage stage)
      Sets the current race stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the Stage to set

    • getTrackName

      public String getTrackName()
      Returns the name of the current track.
      Returns:
      the track name

    • setTrackName

      public void setTrackName(String trackName)
      Sets the name of the track.
      Parameters:
      trackName - the name of the track

    • control

      public abstract Action control(SensorModel sensors)
      Main control method that must be implemented by subclasses. Defines the driving behavior given sensor inputs.
      Parameters:
      sensors - the current sensor readings
      Returns:
      an Action representing the desired driving commands

    • reset

      public abstract void reset()
      Called at the beginning of each new trial to reset internal state.

    • shutdown

      public abstract void shutdown()
      Called once when the controller is shutting down. Used to clean up resources if necessary.
